## 前言

## 正文

<p>
$$
D_t = \sum_x \left\| \psi_t^x - \psi_t^0\right\|
$$
</p>

<p>
$$
\begin{align*}
  D(\rho, \sigma) &= \max_P\ \text{tr}(P(\rho - \sigma))\\
  D(\rho, \sigma) &= \max_{\{E_m\}} D(p_m, q_m)\\
  F(\rho, \sigma) &= \max_{\ket{\psi}, \ket{\varphi}}\, \left| \braket{\psi}{\varphi}\right|\\
  F(\rho, \sigma) &= \min_{\{E_m\}} F(p_m, q_m)\\
\end{align*}
$$
</p>
